title: Please let me pass bootcamp!
post_body: I have always loved the idea of coding. I know there is so much to learn in a few short months. I just hope and pray I can pass this class.

title: The Power of Search Engines
post_body: It's amazing what you can find when you have the internet, a computer and the power of your fingertips. You can find anything you want. That is why I love search engines.
